title: Pizzeria Rex
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pizzeria known for its separate vegan pizza menu. Uses vegan cheese and has an extensive list of vegan toppings such as pepperoni, kebab, and tuna. All vegan pizzas cost 10 SEK more than all the other pizzas; see menu on website for choices. Kitchen open until 10pm. Has a typical Swedish pizzeria atmosphere with lots of dark wood and a pool table. Also boasts a basement with a collection of pinball machines from the 80s and 90s (King Flippaz Paradize). Often organizes jazz concerts or club evenings with soul, punk or rock music.
